title: Building an AI Evaluation Platform on GCP: 35 Microservices, 3 Kubernetes Clusters
summary: A deep dive into the architecture behind a production-grade AI agent evaluation system with 35 Cloud Run services, 3 GKE clusters, 17 PostgreSQL databases, and 35 Pub/Sub topics.

title: Event-Driven Architecture on GCP: Pub/Sub, Cloud Tasks, and Cloud Scheduler
summary: How we orchestrated a 6-phase AI evaluation pipeline with 35 Pub/Sub topics, dead-letter queues, Cloud Tasks, Cloud Scheduler, and zero silent failures.

title: The Database Bug That Took Down Our AI Pipeline: Debugging AlloyDB SSL Drops
summary: How we diagnosed and fixed random SSL connection failures in AlloyDB that caused 5% of our evaluation tasks to fail. A 3-line config change that saved hundreds of engineering hours.

title: How to Build Idempotent Cloud Tasks Handlers in Python
summary: The pattern that eliminated our duplicate record bugs. A practical guide using FastAPI, PostgreSQL, and deterministic UUIDs for at-least-once delivery systems.

title: Zero-Downtime Embedding Migration: Switching Models in a Production RAG System
summary: Step-by-step playbook for migrating embedding models in production using pgvector. Two environment variables made the difference between a 2-day migration and a 2-week one.

title: I Built an Open-Source AI Code Quality Tool â€” 38 Releases in 5 Weeks
summary: Rigour: an open-source quality gate for AI-generated code supporting 10+ languages, security vulnerability detection, and MCP protocol for IDE integration.

title: Building an RL Training Arena for AI Code Agents on GCP
summary: A reinforcement learning environment for training AI coding agents. Gym-style API, Cloud Build sandboxing, Redis episode state, Firestore trajectories. 12,000+ lines of code.

title: I Audited Our AI Platform and Found 25 Critical Security Issues
summary: A systematic security audit revealed SQL injection, hardcoded credentials, secrets in logs, and a 3,677-line God Class. Here's the methodology and how we fixed them.
